str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An instruction, tradition. From paradidomi; transmission, i.e. a precept; specially, the Jewish traditionary law.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Comparative of presbus; older; as noun, a senior; specially, an Israelite Sanhedrist or Christian 'presbyter'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To wash; mid. I wash my own (hands, etc.). To cleanse; ceremonially, to perform ablution.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The fist. From a primary pux; the clenched hand, i.e. with the fist.
